attributes.action: Campaign to provide greater safety awareness for cyclists
attributes.additional_details:
We want the Government to take Cycling safety more seriously so as to prevent the several thousand deaths and injuries on British roads each year.

This is to be achieved through bike safety awareness adverts on TV that give drivers a greater understanding of what it’s like to ride a bike on British roads.

Additionally, a policy of introducing bicycle use during driver learning would be implemented, so as to enhance the 'shared road' concept and improve driver awareness towards cyclists and other road users.

rejection.details: Petitions have been made both in respect of driver awareness campaigns and bicycle use as a component of driver training.
